thread.title: Bryan County man arrested on child porn charges
thread.title_full: Bryan County man arrested on child porn charges | savannahnow.com

author: Jamie Parker
title: Bryan County man arrested on child porn charges
text:
Photos By Jamie Parker A Bryan County man has been arrested on child pornography charges.
Early Friday morning members of the Bryan County Sheriff’s Office Internet Crimes against Children Task Force along with the FBI Southeast Georgia Child Exploitation Task Force executed a search warrant at 58 Laurenburg Drive in the Buckhead subdivision east of Richmond Hill where they arrested Lucius Penn for possession and distribution of child pornography.
“The protection of our children is the sheriff’s office highest priority,” Bryan County Sheriff Clyde Smith said.
 Smith added that the investigation is on-going and that anyone with information regarding it is asked to call 912-756-3101.
